text: The Frozen Ground is a 2013 American crime movie based on a true story. It tells the story of a woman who helped to catch serial killer Robert Hansen in 1983. Hansen murdered 17 young women, and kidnapped and raped at least 30 others, in Alaska during the 1970s and early 1980s. The movie stars Vanessa Hudgens as Cindy Paulson, Nicolas Cage as Sergeant Jack Halcombe, and John Cusack as Hansen. The movie guest stars James Maslow as Daniel O' Brian and Kendall Schmidt as Riley McKessie. The movie was released August 23, 2013 in North America. The reviews of the movie were mixed. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2013 thriller movies Category:2013 crime drama movies Category:2010s serial killer movies Category:Movies set in Alaska Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Movies based on real life events Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Rape in movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: The Frozen Ground
